name: Paimon xAI SPV Token
description: The XAI token represents fractional ownership in a BVI-based SPV that indirectly invests in xAI (Elon Musk's AI company) via partnered U.S. venture capitals. It offers retail investors exposure to xAI’s growth (valued at $80-113B in 2025), known for its Grok AI chatbot and integration with X/Twitter. Priced at $60/token, it provides economic rights but no voting power. Returns are tied to xAI’s performance, with projected 2-10x gains over 5-7 years. Liquidity is limited until liquidation events (e.g., IPO). Fees include a 1% SPV management fee. Tokens are on BNB Chain.
